meanings.definition: The state of being away or not being present.
meanings.sent1: Her absence from the meeting was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The absence of noise made the room feel peaceful.
meanings.sent3: In the absence of his favorite toy, he found a new game to play.
meanings.sent4: The absence of stars in the city sky saddened her.
meanings.sent5: The absence of sunlight in the cave created a sense of mystery.

meanings.definition: The lack or nonexistence of something.
meanings.sent1: The absence of food in the fridge meant they had to order takeout.
meanings.sent2: His absence of fear during the storm surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The absence of color in the painting gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: The absence of laughter in the room made it feel somber.
meanings.sent5: The absence of music in the park made the atmosphere dull.

meanings.sent1: Her absence from the game disappointed her teammates.
meanings.sent2: The student's absence from class affected his grades.
meanings.sent3: In the absence of the lead actor, the play was canceled.
meanings.sent4: The absence of applause at the end of the performance was awkward.
meanings.sent5: The absence of cheers from the crowd made the victory less exciting.
